heroBanner.title: Learn Trading Easily and Safely.
heroBanner.description: A simulation environment specially designed for beginners. Without the risk of losing real money, you can understand the crypto market more deeply and professionally.

1.title: Monitor the Crypto Market in Real-Time
1.description: Explore various crypto asset pairs with live price data, volume, and trends. Equipped with interactive charts to help you analyze the market easily.

2.title: Learn Trading Without Risk
2.description: Practice buying and selling crypto assets without any risk. This feature helps you understand trading mechanics while learning to make investment decisions.

3.title: Track Your Transaction History
3.description: Keep a complete record of all your trading activities. View transaction history, analyze past trades, and make better decisions for future investments.

4.title: View and Monitor Your Portfolio
4.description: Learn how to read your portfolio with complete charts and asset data. This simulation is designed to help you understand the outcomes of your trading decisions.
